component.name: addConditionalFormatRule
component.description: Establishes a new conditional formatting rule.

component.name: updateConditionalFormatRule
component.description: Update a conditional formatting rule or its priority.

component.name: setDataValidation
component.description: Apply data validation rule to a range.

component.name: repeatCellStyle
component.description: Repeat formatting of cells over a range.

component.name: mergeCells
component.description: Merge a range of cells into one cell.
